text: Krasny Yar () is a rural locality (a settlement) in Ivanchinskoye Rural Settlement, Gaynsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 158 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located 46 km south-west from Gayny. == References == Category:Rural localities in Gaynsky District
title: Krasny Yar, Gaynsky District, Perm Krai
